name: Dye the die
description:
In this thrilling puzzle game you're going to live the intense life of a die that has no face painted yet. This situation is unacceptable and you need to roll to fix it. Roll over a grid to correctly dye your faces in an valid pattern.

Music by Gooseninja: https://gooseninja.itch.io/minimalistc-loops
Some sfx and icons by Kenney https://kenney.nl/
